formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For Males: \\( BMR = 88.362 + (13.397 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (4.799 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5.677 \times \text{age}) \\) For Females: \\( BMR = 447.593 + (9.247 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (3.098 \times \text{height in cm}) - (4.330 \times \text{age}) \\)
